plugins.name: Selective Picker - Filter & Select Only What You Need in Figma!
plugins.description:
🎨 Selective Picker は、Figmaでより正確にオブジェクトを選択できる最強のプラグイン！

現在の選択範囲から テキスト・図形・画像 だけを簡単にフィルタリングして選択可能。

グループやフレームの内部要素 も自動で展開し、細かい調整がラクに！


✅ 主な機能:

•🔍 フィルタを適用して、テキスト・図形・画像のみを選択

•🎯 グループ & フレームの中の要素も自動選択

•🚀 選択作業を効率化し、デザインワークをスムーズに！


🔹 面倒な手動選択とはサヨナラ！ Selective Picker でスマートにオブジェクトを選ぼう！


----------------------------------------------------------

🎨 Selective Picker is the ultimate Figma plugin for precise selection! Easily filter and select only Text, Shapes, or Images from your current selection, even within Groups & Frames.


✅ Key Features:

•🔍 Filter & Select only Text, Objects, or Images

•🎯 Expands Groups & Frames to select inner elements

•🚀 Boost your workflow by focusing only on what matters


🔹 Say goodbye to manual selection and pick exactly what you need with Selective Picker!
plugins.tagline: Filter & Select Only What You Need in Figma.

plugins.name: Publish Ninja - Publish websites directly from Figma
plugins.description:
Turn your designs into live websites directly from Figma!

With Publish Ninja, you can instantly turn your Figma designs into fully functional, responsive websites directly from Figma.


🎉 Try it free! - We offer a 7-day free trial so you can experience publishing directly from Figma.


Why use Publish Ninja?

You’ve designed a website in Figma, but now you’re stuck. Either you need a developer, or you have to wrestle with complicated website builders. It’s frustrating, time-consuming, and slows you down.


Publish Ninja lets you publish fully responsive websites directly from Figma—no coding needed. With just a few clicks, your design goes live as a website.


⚡ How it Works

  1. Design in Figma – Create your site just like any other Figma project.
  2. Customize responsiveness – Easily adjust layouts for mobile, tablet, and desktop.
  3. Publish instantly – One click, and your website is live!


🔥 Why Choose Publish Ninja?


✅ No-Code website builder – No technical skills required.

✅ Live in seconds – Skip the hassle of exporting and coding.

✅ Custom domains – Publish on your own domain with ease.

✅ SEO-optimized – Built-in performance & search engine best practices.

accepted.name: Publish Ninja
accepted.description:

Seamlessly publish directly to the web-no coding needed.

plugins.tagline: Publish your designs into live websites directly from Figma

plugins.name: Margin Detective
plugins.description:
Say goodbye to inconsistencies and hello to perfectly aligned designs. With Margin Detective, you get a vigilant partner that scans your frames, checks margins and spacings, and ensures they align with your document variables. When something’s off, it offers smart corrections or swaps, keeping your design cohesive and professional.


Whether you’re fine-tuning layouts or auditing a massive project, Margin Detective empowers you to maintain flawless alignment, harmony, and consistency—all with the efficiency of a true design detective.


Design smarter. Stay consistent. Every pixel, every time.
plugins.tagline: Detect. Correct. Perfect your design.

plugins.name: MultiText Inserter
plugins.description:
MultiText Inserter helps you quickly create multiple text fields in your designs all at once. Instead of adding each text box one by one, you can enter all your text at once, set the font size, color, and style, and the plugin will generate all the text fields for you automatically. It's a real time-saver for designers who need to add lists of text elements.


Example of Footer Content:


"About Us"

"Contact"

"Privacy Policy"

"Terms of Service"

"© 2023 Your Company Name"

You can input these lines into the plugin, and it will create individual text fields for each item, styled according to your settings.

accepted.name: Muhiris
accepted.description: Love getting paid for something I do for fun.

plugins.tagline: Multitext Inserter to save time and make you productive

plugins.name: Instance Find - Pro
plugins.description:
Keeping your design system up-to-date is now easier than ever! With Instance Find-Pro, you can effortlessly search across all the pages impacted by your components and make any necessary changes.


It also generates a handy CSV file that you can share with developers to streamline tracking. 📊


🙏 I’d love for you to try it out and share your feedback! As this is my first plugin, I’m always looking to improve and grow, and your input would mean the world to me. There’s always room to get better! ✨
plugins.tagline: Find, navigate through, and download a CSV file listing all instances of a component within a file.

plugins.name: Collect and Rename
plugins.description:
Collect and Rename allows users to easily collect text elements from a design document, rename them, and navigate to specific layers on different pages.


Main features:


1. Collection of text elements:

- The plugin automatically collects all text elements in the document.

2. Renaming texts:

- Ability to rename text layers directly in the plugin interface.

- After renaming, text layers are updated in real time.

3. Layer navigation:

- Ability to navigate to a specific layer, even if it is on a different page of the document.



How to use the plugin:


1. Installation and launch:

- Install the "Collect and Rename" plugin from the Figma Community.

- Open your project in Figma and launch the plugin through the "Plugins" menu.

2. Text collection:

- The plugin will automatically collect all text elements from the current document and display them in the interface.

3. Renaming texts:

- In the plugin interface, you will see a list of all text layers.

- For each text element:

- "Current text" shows the current text of the layer.

- "New text" provides a field for entering new text.

- Enter the new text in the "New text" field and press "Apply" or the Enter key to confirm.

- The layer text will be updated, and you will see a notification about a successful update.

4. Navigation to layers:

- Click on the text field of the layer to automatically navigate to it in the document, even if it is on a different page.

5. Closing the plugin:

- Close the plugin when you finish your work by pressing the "Close" button in the plugin interface.
plugins.tagline: The plugin shows all text layers in a list, making it easy to replace text.

plugins.name: Text Extractor
plugins.description:
🎥 Watch the demo video here


Plugin Features


Extract Text from Selected Figma Frames

Easily extract text from selected frames. Whether you select a single frame or multiple frames, you can quickly extract all the text within them.


Automatically Generate Variable Names

Automatically convert extracted text into variable names using camelCase format. This feature supports English text only, ensuring consistent and clean variable naming for your projects.


Create Custom Delimiter Sets

Design your own delimiter sets to wrap text with brackets, quotes, or any custom markers. Use intuitive keyboard shortcuts to apply these delimiters, enhancing your workflow for variable processing and other text transformation tasks.


Easily Copy and Paste

Effortlessly copy the extracted text and variable names to paste into Google Sheets or other tools.


Switch Between Design and Dev Modes

Support both design and dev modes, with dev mode as the default. Use design mode for a compact interface.




🎥 데모 영상 보기


플러그인 기능


Figma 프레임에서 텍스트 추출

선택한 프레임의 텍스트를 손쉽게 추출하세요. 프레임 하나를 선택하든, 여러 프레임을 선택하든 프레임 안의 모든 텍스트를 빠르게 추출할 수 있습니다.


자동 변수명 생성

추출된 텍스트를 camelCase 형식의 변수명으로 자동 변환합니다. 영어 텍스트에 최적화되어 있으며, 일관된 변수명을 통해 프로젝트의 가독성을 높입니다.


사용자 정의 구분자 세트 만들기

텍스트를 괄호나 인용 부호 등으로 감싸기 위한 구분자 세트를 만들어보세요. 직관적인 키보드 단축키로 구분자를 적용하여 변수 처리 등 텍스트 변환 작업을 더욱 효율적으로 수행할 수 있습니다.


간편한 복사 및 붙여넣기

추출한 텍스트와 변수명을 복사하여 Google Sheets 등 다른 작업 공간에 쉽게 붙여넣을 수 있습니다.


디자인 모드와 개발 모드 전환

필요에 따라 디자인 모드와 개발 모드를 전환하여 사용하세요. 기본 모드는 개발 모드이며, 디자인 모드에서는 컴팩트한 인터페이스를 제공합니다.
plugins.tagline: Extract text from frames and auto-generate variable names

필요에 따라 디자인 모드와 개발 모드를 전환하여 사용하세요. 기본 모드는 개발 모드이며, 디자인 모드에서는 컴팩트한 인터페이스를 제공합니다.

plugins.name: Mendly — Merge & Fix Broken Variables
plugins.description:
**Streamline your design system maintenance with powerful variable management tools.**


## Key Features


**🔄 Smart Variable Merging**

- Combine duplicate color variables into one

- Automatically updates all references throughout your design

- Preserves semantic variable relationships

- Optional renaming during merge process


**🔧 Broken Variable Detection & Repair**

- Scans current page for broken variable references

- Smart suggestions based on variable naming patterns

- Navigate between elements using the same broken variable

- Batch fix multiple variables at once


**⚡ Intelligent Analysis**

- Shows direct vs semantic variable usage

- Counts affected elements before merging

- Identifies variable dependencies

- Context-aware replacement suggestions


**🎯 Perfect For**

- Design system cleanup and maintenance

- Removing duplicate variables after design updates

- Fixing broken references after variable deletions

- Streamlining color variable organization


**💡 How It Works**

1. Select source variable (will be removed) and target variable (will remain)

2. Preview affected elements and usage statistics

3. Merge variables with one click - all references automatically update

4. Use the fix tool to repair any broken variable links


Save hours of manual work and keep your design system clean and organized!
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly merge duplicate variables and fix broken references in your design system.

plugins.name: Tailwind Text Styles Generator
plugins.description:
Tailwind Text Style Generator is a Figma plugin that helps you automatically generate text styles from Google Fonts, based on Tailwind typography scale.


Tired of manually creating text styles and organizing layers one by one? This plugin does it all for you:


🎨 Choose from 1,800+ Google Fonts

📏 Auto-generate Text Styles using Tailwind-friendly sizing (sm, base, lg, xl, etc.)

⚡ Perfect for dev-design alignment especially for teams using Tailwind CSS

📁 Organized neatly: styles are grouped and named by scale

🔁 Try different fonts freely great for experimenting and iterating

💾 Instantly saved into your current design system


Whether you're building a design system or just want to speed up your workflow, this plugin makes it seamless, scalable, and developer-friendly.
plugins.tagline: 1.800 Fonts. 1 Click. Done.

Whether you're building a design system or just want to speed up your workflow, this plugin makes it seamless, scalable, and developer-friendly.

plugins.name: TRANS-AI
plugins.description:
TRANS-AI helps designers create multilingual designs by translating text layers and automatically adjusting layouts for right-to-left languages.


Key Features:

  1. Translate selected text layers using OpenAI, Anthropic, or Gemini API (bring your own API key)
  2. One-click layout conversion between RTL and LTR designs
  3. Option to automatically adjust layouts when translating to/from RTL languages
  4. Exclude specific layers from translation using the layer name filter
  5. Preserves text formatting while converting layouts


Perfect for teams creating multilingual products, localizing interfaces, or working with global audiences. TRANS-AI streamlines the localization workflow, saving designers hours of manual adjustments when adapting designs for different languages.
plugins.tagline: Go global in seconds! AI-powered translation with smart RTL/LTR layout conversion.

plugins.name: Chroma Forge
plugins.description:
Chroma Forge for Figma


A powerful color selection plugin for Figma that provides an intuitive color wheel and advanced color harmony tools to create consistent color palettes.


Features


Interactive Color Wheel

  1. High-precision color selection with a fully interactive color wheel
  2. Adjustable brightness and saturation sliders
  3. Real-time color preview
  4. HEX code input with validation


Color Harmony Tools

  1. Create cohesive color palettes using different harmony types:
  2. Analogous: Colors that are adjacent to each other on the color wheel
  3. Triad: Three colors evenly spaced around the color wheel
  4. Complementary: Colors opposite each other on the color wheel
  5. Split Complementary: A main color and two colors adjacent to its complement
  6. Square: Four colors evenly spaced around the color wheel
  7. Compound: A combination of complementary and analogous harmonies
  8. Mono: A single color with various shades
  9. Custom: Create your own custom harmony by placing markers freely


Flexible Color Selection

  1. Select 2-6 colors at once (depending on harmony type)
  2. Drag markers on the wheel to fine-tune your color selection
  3. Automatic contrast adjustment for optimal visibility


Figma Integration

  1. Apply selected colors directly to selected elements
  2. Create color styles from your palette
  3. Generate color variables with automatic shade variants (10% to 100% brightness)
  4. Intelligent naming system for organizing colors


How to Use


Select a Harmony Type: Choose from the dropdown menu to define how colors relate to each other

Select Number of Colors: Choose how many colors you want in your palette (2-6)

Choose Your Base Color: Click and drag on the color wheel or enter a HEX code

Adjust Saturation and Brightness: Use the sliders to fine-tune your colors

Apply Colors: Use the buttons to:

  1. Apply directly to selected elements
  2. Add to Figma color styles
  3. Add to Figma variables (with automatic shade creation)


Email me

Behance

Dribbble

LinkedIn

accepted.name: Andrei Kuznetsov
accepted.description: Templates, UI Kits, Design Systems, Plugins

plugins.tagline: Create perfect palettes with color harmony tools

plugins.name: Rename From Sublayer
plugins.description:
Rename from sublayers simplifies the process of renaming groups in Figma by automatically detecting image, text or shape layers within selected groups.


You can choose between five modes: image detection, text layer, Rectangle layer, ellipse layer and symbols detection.

Additionally, you can opt to rename all child groups within the hierarchy or just the top-level group, giving you full control over your naming conventions.


Key Features:

  1. Image, Text, Shape Detection: Automatically rename groups based on image names, text names, rectangle names, ellipse names and symbols.
  2. Selective Renaming: Choose to rename just the highest-level group or all nested child groups.
  3. User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive UI to quickly toggle between options.


Whether you're managing large design systems or working on a small project, Rename from sublayers helps keep your layers organized and your workflow efficient.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly rename groups by image, text or shape layers.

116202.name: Rename From Sublayer
116202.description:
Rename from sublayers simplifies the process of renaming groups in Figma by automatically detecting image, text or shape layers within selected groups.


You can choose between five modes: image detection, text layer, Rectangle layer, ellipse layer and symbols detection.

Additionally, you can opt to rename all child groups within the hierarchy or just the top-level group, giving you full control over your naming conventions.


Key Features:

  1. Image, Text, Shape Detection: Automatically rename groups based on image names, text names, rectangle names, ellipse names and symbols.
  2. Selective Renaming: Choose to rename just the highest-level group or all nested child groups.
  3. User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive UI to quickly toggle between options.


Whether you're managing large design systems or working on a small project, Rename from sublayers helps keep your layers organized and your workflow efficient.
116202.tagline: Effortlessly rename groups by image, text or shape layers.

plugins.name: Text to Frame Name
plugins.description:
The Figma plugin “Text to Frame Name” is a handy tool that allows you to replace selected text with the name of the highest-level frame it belongs to, all at once. This is particularly useful for page numbers in presentation materials or proposals. For example, you can set frame names with sequential numbers like “01,” “02,” and “03,” place temporary text (e.g., “00”) on each page, select all the text, and run this plugin to complete page numbering. Even if you reorder or add pages, you can easily reset the numbers by simply modifying the frame names. This eliminates the need for manual number adjustments, significantly improving workflow efficiency.


Figmaプラグイン「Text to Frame Name」は、選択したテキストを、それぞれが属する最上位のフレーム名に一括で置き換えることができる便利なツールです。主にプレゼンテーション資料や提案書などのページ番号で役立ちます。たとえば「01」「02」「03」など連番がついたフレーム名にしておき、各ページに仮のテキスト（例：00）を配置し、すべてのテキストを選択してこのプラグインを実行するだけで、ページ番号制作が完了します。ページを入れ替えたり追加したりしても、フレーム名さえ修正すれば簡単に番号を再設定可能。手動で番号を修正する必要がなくなり、作業効率が大きく向上します。
plugins.tagline: Auto-convert text layers to parent frame names

130123.name: Text to Frame Name
130123.description:

plugins.name: Layer Sweeper
plugins.description:
Effortlessly organize and declutter your design files with the "Layer Sweeper" plugin.


This plugin scans your entire file to identify and delete hidden layers, frames, and groups while respecting locked layers and hidden layers within master components. Streamline your workflow, optimize file performance, and maintain a clean, professional design environment with ease. Perfect for keeping your Figma files organized and efficient.


If you have any suggestions or inquiries, feel free to reach out to me on Twitter.


If you appreciate my work, consider showing your support by buying me a coffee.
plugins.tagline: Remove hidden layers with a single click.

plugins.name: Usably
plugins.description:
Usably: Instant UX Feedback Powered by AI


Get actionable insights to improve usability, accessibility, and visual consistency—all without needing an API key!


This plugin analyzes your design against core UX principles like Hick's Law, Jakob's Law, and more.


How It Works:

  1. Select an area: Choose a single frame or an entire flow with multiple frames.
  2. Click "Review Design": Start the analysis with just one click.
  3. Get feedback: Usably generates comprehensive, actionable feedback to refine your design.


Key Features:

✅ Easy setup: NO API key needed - Install the plugin, sign up with your email, and start reviewing in seconds.

✅ Advanced UX analysis: Incorporates proven UX laws for better design decisions.


The subscription and payment of the plugin is managed by Figma marketplace. You can follow their help center to unsubscribe.


🦄 Free plan includes 5 reviews, paid subscription includes 100 reviews per month.


💌 Need help? Reach out to the Usably team at usably.team@gmail.com.
plugins.tagline: AI-powered UX reviews with insights—no API key needed. Install and start improving your designs!

plugins.name: MultiDesign Assistant
plugins.description:
MultiDesign Assistant 是一款多功能設計輔助工具，能提升 Figma 的工作效率。這個插件提供了四個實用功能：


一鍵交換填充和描邊顏色：快速切換物件的填充和描邊顏色，節省設計時間。

快速調整尺寸：輸入具體數值，一鍵調整物件的長度和寬度。

等比縮小：通過輸入自定義比例或選擇預設值，輕鬆實現物件的等比例縮小。

圓形文字標籤：為選中的文字自動添加圓形背景，完美適用於創建數字標籤等設計元素。



MultiDesign Assistant is a versatile design tool aimed at enhancing productivity for Figma users. This plugin offers four practical features:


One-click Fill and Stroke Swap: Quickly exchange the fill and stroke colors of objects, saving design time.


Quick Size Adjustment: Input specific values to instantly adjust the length and width of objects.


Proportional Scaling: Easily scale objects proportionally by entering custom ratios or selecting from preset values.


Circular Text Labels: Automatically add circular backgrounds to selected text, perfect for creating number tags and similar design elements.
plugins.tagline: Swap colors, adjust sizes, scale proportionally, add circular text backgrounds.

plugins.name: Figmentation
plugins.description:
🪄 Figmentation – where Figma meets Autodocumentation


Tired of manual documentation?

Figmentation automates the process of extracting design tokens directly from your Figma components — including colors, typography, spacing, borders, and effects.

With just one click, Figmentation creates a clean, organized annotation frame beside your component — making handoff easier for developers and keeping your design system crystal clear.


Built by a designer who needed this — and figured others might too.


💡 What it does:

Extracts bound design tokens from your components

Supports multiple naming conventions (camelCase, kebab-case, etc.)

Automatically detects and documents:

Backgrounds, text colors, border colors

Font sizes, families, weights, line heights, letter spacing

Padding, gap, corner radius, stroke weight

Shadows and blurs

Generates readable and structured annotation layers

Keeps token names consistent with your system — or generates smart fallback names


🔧 Use cases:

Design system maintenance

Dev handoff

Figma token organization

plugins.tagline: Where Figma meets Auto-documentation

139801.name: Figmentation
139801.description:
🪄 Figmentation – where Figma meets Autodocumentation


Tired of manual documentation?

Figmentation automates the process of extracting design tokens directly from your Figma components — including colors, typography, spacing, borders, and effects.

With just one click, Figmentation creates a clean, organized annotation frame beside your component — making handoff easier for developers and keeping your design system crystal clear.


Built by a designer who needed this — and figured others might too.


💡 What it does:

Extracts bound design tokens from your components

Supports multiple naming conventions (camelCase, kebab-case, etc.)

Automatically detects and documents:

Backgrounds, text colors, border colors

Font sizes, families, weights, line heights, letter spacing

Padding, gap, corner radius, stroke weight

Shadows and blurs

Generates readable and structured annotation layers

Keeps token names consistent with your system — or generates smart fallback names


🔧 Use cases:

Design system maintenance

Dev handoff

Figma token organization

Fast, scalable documentation for UI libraries


✨ Made for:

Product designers

Design system leads

Developers using Figma tokens

Anyone who hates repetitive documentation


🎯 Figmentation – where Figma meets Autodocumentation.

Crafted with care by someone who gets it.
139801.release_notes:
v1.1.0 :

Fixed async variable access for Figma’s latest API
Fixed some Bugs

plugins.name: Magic Renamer AI - With Design Token mode
plugins.description:
Magic Renamer AI is a Figma plugin that lets you automatically rename all your layers in one click (up to 120 layers at once, with design token support).


With AI, it suggests clear and consistent names that follow design and design system best practices.


🔥Key features:


  1. Smart, instant renaming: The AI analyzes your file and suggests relevant names for each layer.
  2. Time-saving: No more manual renaming—everything is done in seconds, even for large files.
  3. Clarity and consistency: Naming conventions are enforced, making teamwork easier.
  4. Simple interface: One-click use, no complicated setup. Advanced options are available if you need them.
  5. Design token support: Perfect for solo or teams using advanced design systems.
  6. Custom API support: Use your own API key (OpenAI, DeepSeek, Perplexity, or OpenRouter) for more control.


💡 Why choose Magic Renamer AI?

Unlike other plugins, Magic Renamer AI uses artificial intelligence to understand the context of each layer and suggest names tailored to your project. It ensures consistency, reduces errors, and fits seamlessly into your Figma workflow. It’s the perfect tool to save time, improve file quality, and speed up your design process.
plugins.tagline: AI-powered batch renaming for Layers — up to 120 at once -> Clarity | Consistency

plugins.name: ICONCINO - Free icons
plugins.description:
These icons were designed by Gabriele Malaspina and are released under the CC0 1.0 license.


You can use them freely for personal and commercial projects, with no attribution required.


Modify them, remix them, use them in client work or side projects — no strings attached.


All icons are available in a single Figma file to make browsing and copying super easy (using the file you can customize the corner radii).


If you find them useful and want to say thanks, you can buy me a coffee ☕ — totally optional, but always appreciated!

accepted.name: Gabriele Malaspina
accepted.description: Digital product designer ❖ Figma educator ❖ Coordinator of the UI Design Course by Politecnico di Milano ❖ Design systems enthusiast ❖ Accessibility advocate

plugins.tagline: Add icons from the ICONCINO set

plugins.description: Relayout Map Generator is a powerful Figma plugin that allows you to search, customize, and generate high-quality maps directly within your design workflow. With support for OpenStreetMap and place suggestions, it's the perfect tool for creating location-based visuals, UI mockups, travel interfaces, and more—without ever leaving Figma.

plugins.name: Variable Length Lorem Ipsum
plugins.description:
Most text generator plugins let you specify a single number for the word count. However, sometimes you want to specify a range instead, to introduce variability, and create more realistic results (realistic for lorem ipsum text, that is)


Features:

  1. Generates lorem ipsum text with the option of varied lengths.
  2. Enter a single number (e.g., "10") for fixed word count or a range (e.g., "5-10") for random variation within limits.
  3. Optionally add punctuation for generated text (default: off).
  4. Optionally auto-close the plugin after generating text (default: off).
  5. Supports your system setting for light or dark mode.
plugins.tagline: Specify a range of lengths for your lorem ipsum text

plugins.name: SupaFastPages
plugins.description:
This plugin helps designers and teams using Figma to automatically convert sections in a design into separate pages. This can be especially useful when you want to organise your Figma document by moving grouped content (like artboards or frames in a section) into new individual pages.


Key Features:

1. Convert Sections to Pages: The plugin scans the current Figma document and identifies sections (grouped content marked by Figma as "sections"). For each section it finds, the plugin creates a new page with the same name as the section or a default name if none is provided.

2. Move Children to New Pages: It transfers all the child nodes (like frames, components, and groups) inside the section to the newly created page. This helps in better organization and management of design files, where each section is neatly placed into its own page.

3. Remove Empty Sections: Once the children are moved to the new page, the original section is removed, leaving the workspace clean and organized.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly convert sections into organized pages for a cleaner Figma workspace.

109166.name: SupaFastPages
109166.description:
This plugin helps designers and teams using Figma to automatically convert sections in a design into separate pages. This can be especially useful when you want to organise your Figma document by moving grouped content (like artboards or frames in a section) into new individual pages.


Key Features:

1. Convert Sections to Pages: The plugin scans the current Figma document and identifies sections (grouped content marked by Figma as "sections"). For each section it finds, the plugin creates a new page with the same name as the section or a default name if none is provided.

2. Move Children to New Pages: It transfers all the child nodes (like frames, components, and groups) inside the section to the newly created page. This helps in better organization and management of design files, where each section is neatly placed into its own page.

3. Remove Empty Sections: Once the children are moved to the new page, the original section is removed, leaving the workspace clean and organized.
109166.release_notes:
1. UI Adjustments and Styling

•Dialog Box Sizing: Set the dimensions explicitly using figma.showUI(__html__, { width: 260, height: 320 }) in code.ts to ensure the interface displays without scrolling.
•Glassmorphic Background: Updated the container background to use a semi-transparent style with blur and shadow effects, enhancing the visual appeal.
•Font Updates: Applied SF Pro font styling to various elements to maintain a consistent and professional look.

2. Button Behavior Enhancement

•Dynamic Button Text: The Convert button initially displays “Select an Option” and is disabled. When the user selects either “Sections” or “Frames,” the text changes to “Convert,” and the button becomes enabled.
•Button Style Changes: Updated the styling of the disabled and enabled states of the button to use appropriate gradients and colors, making the active state more visually distinct.

3. Selection Feedback

•Option Selection Toggle: Added visual feedback for option selection. When “Sections” or “Frames” is selected, it highlights in red while the unselected option remains grey.
•Single Selection at a Time: Ensured that only one option can be selected at a time, with the other being deselected.

4. User Guidance

•Clear Instruction via Button: By changing the button text dynamically based on the selection, the update guides users through the necessary steps (selecting an option) before conversion, improving usability.
109166.tagline: Effortlessly convert sections into organized pages for a cleaner Figma workspace.
